channel.title: I have noticed that,
channel.description:
This guy called "aaaak" is making the same topics in every section. it always starts with *, mods have told him off but he still continues.
He disses me cause hes jealous of me he thinks i wanna b a mod? rofl
im just here to help
Can some1 answer my question then lock this topic. Cause i know flamming will start
i suggest this user gets banned. if not state a reason. hes very anoying. hes just cause trouble.

Yeah i reported him a few hours ago, this topic musnt go on anymore
